title: Torotoro♥Himeawase
original_name: とろとろ ♥ 姫あわせ
sinopse:
Takai Ayano, university student, was confessed to by her cute, little sister-like classmate Morino Mami and a heart-pounding relationship ensued.

A series about Mami's & Ayano's dreamy-swoony (and lewd) campus love story.

(Source: Translated from official description)
